name: Key Lime Box
tagline: Simple projects to make life sweet
body:
We like to help out people by making some code available for everyone to use. These projects help us - they may make life sweet for you too.

You can use them all as you wish. We will gladly accept pull-requests. And if you use it, feel free to drop us a note.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
